webex-desk-mini.name: Webex Desk Mini
webex-desk-mini.description: Create an instant workspace with the portable video conferencing device that's designed for taking meetings with you to any room—even your kitchen.
features: Portable design perfect for the kitchen, bedroom, or any small workspace
Background noise removal to eliminate distractions at home
Join any meeting service—including Webex, Zoom, and Microsoft—with a click of a button
Meet, call, and co-create from a single device

specs.text: Camera: 8MP image sensors, supports up to 30fps
Field of view: 64° horizontal field of view, 50° vertical field of view
Speakers: Single-channel loudspeaker system with a high quality 18mm tweeter and dual force-cancelling 80mm woofers

cisco-headset-730.name: Cisco Headset 730
cisco-headset-730.description: Go anywhere with the award-winning, on-ear wireless headset designed for work and play.
features: Portable and wireless with up to 20-hours of talk time so you can take your meetings with you wherever you go.
Boomless design for all day comfort.
Easily switch between meetings and calls to your favorite focus-work playlist.
Active noise cancellation with background noise reduction help keep audio crystal clear in any environment.

specs.text: Connectivity: Bluetooth® 5.0, USB-A, and 3.5 mm (audio only)
Voice activated AI: Access Google Assistant or Siri
On-ear buttons for easy call and music controls
Companion mobile app for configuration and customization

meraki-z3c.name: Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway
meraki-z3c.description: Provide security, convenience, and optimized access to your home office.
features: Always-on VPN. An office-like experience at home with Wi-Fi that’s always connected.
VOIP telephony. Plug-and-play office telephony in a home office from PoE-enabled ports.
Network visibility. Insight into how apps are performing for remote workers with powerful end-to-end analytics.

specs.text: Recommended use cases: Teleworker with VoIP or PoE, IoT, and M2M
WAN Interfaces: 1 x GbE RJ45; 1 x USB (cellular failover)
